parameters.name: Evaluation Time Window
parameters.description: The time window (resolution) over which alert logic is evaluated
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Evaluation Interval
parameters.description: The interval at which the alert is evaluated. This is a time duration, for example, 1S means the alert should be evaluated every 1 second.
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: General Behaviour Time Window
parameters.description: The time window that is used to establish general historical behaviour (e.g. a day, week)
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Trend Sampling Count
parameters.description: The number of data samples for calculating trends of the Evaluation and General Behaviour Time Windows. It is given a time dimension by the Trend Sampling Frequency

parameters.name: Trend Sampling Frequency
parameters.description: The sampling frequency that trend calculations use (e.g. every day, 2 days, week). This must be a multiple of days.
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in days formatted as xD where x is the number of days

parameters.name: Suspicious Position vs Available Quantity Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of max. position within the Evaluation Time Window to the available quantity of an instrument in its market becomes suspicious e.g. cornering the market

parameters.name: Suspicious Position vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of max. position within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspicious e.g. generally unusual behaviour

parameters.name: Suspicious Position vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of max. position within the Evaluation Time Window to its Trend becomes suspicious e.g. unusual behaviour for that time of day

parameters.name: Suspicious Price Volatility vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of mid price volatility within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspicious

parameters.name: Suspicious Price Volatility vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of mid price volatility within the Evaluation Time Window to its Evaluation Time Window Trend becomes suspicious

parameters.name: Suspicious Mid Price Move vs General Behaviour Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of mid price move within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend for mid price volatility becomes suspicious

parameters.name: Suspicious Mid Price Move vs Evaluation Window Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of mid price move within the Evaluation Time Window to its Evaluation Time Window Trend for mid price volatility becomes suspicious

logicOverrides.name: Disable Position vs Available Quantity Check
logicOverrides.description: Disable check for net position versus available quantity

logicOverrides.name: Disable Position vs Historical Trend Check
logicOverrides.description: Disable net position check versus historical trends in the Evaluation and General Behaviour Time Windows

logicOverrides.name: Disable Market Move and Volatility Check
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for market move and volatility versus historical trends in the Evaluation and General Behaviour Time Windows

parameters.name: Evaluation Time Window
parameters.description: The time window (resolution) over which alert logic is evaluated
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Evaluation Interval
parameters.description: The interval at which the alert is evaluated. This is a time duration, for example, 1S means the alert should be evaluated every 1 second.
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Small Net Position Move Threshold
parameters.description: The level below which a move in net position within the Evaluation Time Window is considered minimal

parameters.name: Small Net Proceeds Move Threshold
parameters.description: The level below which a move in net proceeds within the Evaluation Time Window is considered minimal

logicOverrides.name: Disable Net Position Move Checks
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for minimal net position move in the Evaluation Time Window

logicOverrides.name: Disable Net Proceeds Move Checks
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for minimal net proceeds move in the Evaluation Time Window

parameters.name: Evaluation Time Window
parameters.description: The time window (resolution) over which alert logic is evaluated
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Evaluation Interval
parameters.description: The interval at which the alert is evaluated. This is a time duration, for example, 1S means the alert should be evaluated every 1 second.
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Suspicious Traded Volume vs Net Position Move Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the volume traded as a percentage of the net position move within the Evaluation Time Window becomes suspicious

parameters.name: Evaluation Time Window
parameters.description: The time window (resolution) over which alert logic is evaluated
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Evaluation Interval
parameters.description: The interval at which the alert is evaluated. This is a time duration, for example, 1S means the alert should be evaluated every 1 second.
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: General Behaviour Time Window
parameters.description: The time window that is used to establish general historical behaviour (e.g. a day, week)
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Trend Sampling Count
parameters.description: The number of data samples for calculating trends of the Evaluation and General Behaviour Time Windows. It is given a time dimension by the Trend Sampling Frequency

parameters.name: Trend Sampling Frequency
parameters.description: The sampling frequency that trend calculations use (e.g. every day, 2 days, week). This must be a multiple of days.
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in days formatted as xD where x is the number of days

parameters.name: Suspicious Position vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of net position move within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspicious e.g. generally unusual behaviour

parameters.name: Suspicious Position vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of net position move within the Evaluation Time Window to its Trend becomes suspicious e.g. unusual behaviour for that time of day

parameters.name: Suspicious Market Price Move vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of market mid price move within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Market Price Move vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of market mid price increase within the Evaluation Time Window to its Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Buy Execution Count vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the number of buy executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Buy Execution Count vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the number of buy executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Buy Execution Volume vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the volume of buy executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Buy Execution Volume vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the volume of buy executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Sell Execution Count vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the number of sell executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Sell Execution Count vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the number of sell executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Sell  Execution Volume vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the volume of sell executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Sell  Execution Volume vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the volume of sell executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Net Position Move Future Time Window Start
parameters.description: The time, relative to the end of the Evaluation Time Window, that the future Net Position move should start being evaluated
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Net Position Move Future Time Window End
parameters.description: The time, relative to the end of the Evaluation Time Window, that the future Net Position move should stop being evaluated
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Net Position Move Future Evaluation Time Window
parameters.description: The time window (resolution) over which Net Position move is evaluated within the bound of the Future Time Window. (e.g. must be shorter than the Future Time Window)
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Net Position Move Future Evaluation Interval
parameters.description: The interval at which the Net Position move check in the future is evaluated. This is a time duration, for example, 1S means the alert should be evaluated every 1 second.
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Future Net Position Move vs Evaluation Net Position Threshold (%)
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio (as a %) of the Net Position move in the Future Evaluation Time Window to the Net Position at the end of the current Evaluation Time Window becomes suspicious

parameters.name: Mid Price Move Future Time Window Start
parameters.description: The time, relative to the end of the Evaluation Time Window, that the future Market Mid Price Move should start being evaluated
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Mid Price Move Future Time Window End
parameters.description: The time, relative to the end of the Evaluation Time Window, that the future Market Mid Price Move should stop being evaluated
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Mid Price Move Future Evaluation Time Window
parameters.description: The time window (resolution) over which Market Mid Price is evaluated within the bound of the Future Time Window. (e.g. must be shorter than the Future Time Window)
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Mid Price Move Future Evaluation Interval
parameters.description: The interval at which the Market Mid Price move check in the future is evaluated. This is a time duration, for example, 1S means the alert should be evaluated every 1 second.
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Future Mid Price Move vs Evaluation Mid Price Threshold (%)
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio (as a %) of the Market Mid Price move in the Future Evaluation Time Window to the Market Mid Price at the end of the current Evaluation Time Window becomes suspicious

logicOverrides.name: Disable Net Position Move Checks
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for significant net position move in the Evaluation Time Window vs historical trends

logicOverrides.name: Disable Market Price Move Checks
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for significant market mid price move in the Evaluation Time Window vs historical trends

logicOverrides.name: Disable Buy Execution Checks
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for significant buy execution activity in the Evaluation Time Window vs historical trends

logicOverrides.name: Disable Sell Execution Checks
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for significant sell execution activity in the Evaluation Time Window vs historical trends

logicOverrides.name: Disable Future Net Position Move Checks
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for significant net position move in a future evaluation time window relative to the current Evaluation Time Window

logicOverrides.name: Disable Future News Checks
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for significant market mid price move in the Evaluation Time Window vs historical trends

logicOverrides.name: Disable Future Market Price Move Checks
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for significant market mid price move in a future evaluation time window relative to the current Evaluation Time Window

parameters.name: Evaluation Time Window
parameters.description: The time window (resolution) over which alert logic is evaluated
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Evaluation Interval
parameters.description: The interval at which the alert is evaluated. This is a time duration, for example, 1S means the alert should be evaluated every 1 second.
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: General Behaviour Time Window
parameters.description: The time window that is used to establish general historical behaviour (e.g. a day, week)
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in seconds formatted as xS where x is the number of seconds

parameters.name: Trend Sampling Count
parameters.description: The number of data samples for calculating trends of the Evaluation and General Behaviour Time Windows. It is given a time dimension by the Trend Sampling Frequency

parameters.description: The sampling frequency that trend calculations use (e.g. every day, 2 days, week). This must be a multiple of days.
parameters.dataTypeDescription: Duration expressed in days formatted as xD where x is the number of days

parameters.name: Suspicious Buy Execution Count vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the number of buy executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Buy Execution Count vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the number of buy executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Buy Execution Volume vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the volume of buy executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Buy Execution Volume vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the volume of buy executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Sell Execution Count vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the number of sell executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Sell Execution Count vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the number of sell executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Sell  Execution Volume vs General Behaviour Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the volume of sell executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its General Behaviour Time Window Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Suspicious Sell  Execution Volume vs Evaluation Window Trend Threshold
parameters.description: The level at which the ratio of the volume of sell executions within the Evaluation Time Window to its Trend becomes suspiciously large

parameters.name: Low Execution Price Volatility Threshold
parameters.description: The level below which the execution price volatility within the Evaluation Time Window is considered low

logicOverrides.name: Disable Buy Execution Checks
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for significant buy execution activity in the Evaluation Time Window vs historical trends

logicOverrides.name: Disable Sell Execution Checks
logicOverrides.description: Disable checks for significant sell execution activity in the Evaluation Time Window vs historical trends
